Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-64324 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-31
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-64324 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-31. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 0.59.0-31, affected by CVE-2025-64324
